amendment.description: Amendment expands the list of aggravating factors in the Federal death penalty statute to include situations where a defendant kills or attempts to kill more than one person in a single criminal episode.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to expand the situations eligible to receive a death penalty sentence to include instances where a defendant kills or attempts to kill more than one person at a time.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Martini amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.
